summary: The module implements an extractive text summarization pipeline that encodes document sentences with SentenceTransformers, builds a cosine‑similarity graph, and applies the LexRank algorithm—using a Markov transition matrix and power‑iteration eigenvector centrality—to rank and select the most representative sentences as a summary.
business_intent: Enable automated generation of concise document summaries for applications such as report condensation, content preview, and information retrieval, reducing manual reading effort and improving knowledge extraction.
